alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:43AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Clayton, Allamakee, southwestern Vernon, northern Grant, Richland and Crawford Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 842 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Albin to 7 miles southeast of Waukon to near Elgin. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Harpers Ferry around 850 AM CDT. Elkader around 855 AM CDT. Farmersburg around 900 AM CDT. Garnavillo around 905 AM CDT. Boscobel around 915 AM CDT. Richland Center and Muscoda around 925 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Volney, Eastman, Highway 61 And County T, Montfort, Giard, Gillingham, Neptune, County Roads A And Z, National and Retreat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
